custom_css: /* Center logo, brand name, and tagline in footer */.footer__brand_name,.footer__tagline,.footer__logo {text-align: center; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;}
/* If there's a container wrapping these elements */.footer__brand {text-align: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;}

settings.tagline: Delivery-first IT consulting for security, enterprise systems, and commerce.
